content:
The chunk is part of a larger configuration document for generating comprehensive and well-formatted documentation using the Sphinx toolset. Specifically, this section focuses on enhancing LaTeX output by customizing how certain Unicode characters are escaped or represented in the final PDF or LaTeX-generated documents.

# If true, show URL addresses after external links.
#latex_show_urls = False

# Documents to append as an appendix to all manuals.
#latex_appendices = []

# If false, no module index is generated.
#latex_domain_indices = True

from sphinx.util import texescape
texescape.tex_replacements += [
    ('\ufe0f', ''), # unicode representation
    ('\u274c', r'\(\pmb{\times}\)'), # cross mark
]

# -- Options for manual page output ---------------------------------------

# One entry per manual page. List of tuples
# (source start file, name, description, authors, manual section).
man_pages = [
    ('index', 'panda3d', u'Panda3D Documentation',
     [u'Panda3D'], 1)
]

# If true, show URL addresses after external links.
#man_show_urls = False


# -- Options for Texinfo output -------------------------------------------
